Package btindices.indicesmanager

Class CtCIndicesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • btindices.indicesmanager.BTIndicesManager
      • btindices.indicesmanager.CtCIndicesManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CtCIndicesManagerImpl
    public abstract class CtCIndicesManager
extends BTIndicesManager
    This class provides methods in order to load BT Indices from a file and make use of its inherent functionalities for the exploration of an HDT file.
    Author:
    Maximilian Wenzel

    • Field Detail

      • btIndices

        public BTIndex[][] btIndices
        The 2-dimensional BTIndex array represents all RDF class combinations. The index of the corresponding class can be retrieved with the "classURIs" variable.

      • hdt

        public org.rdfhdt.hdt.hdt.HDT hdt

      • executeQueryItString

        public abstract org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleString executeQueryItString​(URI classURI1,
                                                                                 URI classURI2,
                                                                                 String s,
                                                                                 String p,
                                                                                 String o)
        Executes a query on the specified RDF Class-Class index. Returns the results as an iterator. Null values in strings act as wildcards.

      • executeQuery

        public abstract org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleID executeQuery​(URI classURI1,
                                                                     URI classURI2,
                                                                     long s,
                                                                     long p,
                                                                     long o)
        Executes a query on the specified RDF Class-Class index. Returns the results as an iterator. '0' values act as wildcards.

      • getReachableCategories

        public abstract ReachableCategories getReachableCategories​(URI center)
        Returns all reachable categories (i.e. RDF classes) for a given RDF class.

      • getIncomingCategories

        public abstract ArrayList<SingleJoinModel> getIncomingCategories​(URI center)
        Returns all incoming categories for an initial center.

      • getOutgoingCategories

        public abstract ArrayList<SingleJoinModel> getOutgoingCategories​(URI center)
        Returns all outgoing categories for an initial center.

      • getReachableCategories

        public abstract ReachableCategories getReachableCategories​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsSubject,
                                                           org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsObject,
                                                           URI center)
        Returns all reachable categories (i.e. RDF types) for a given subset of a center. The hash set contains a subset of resources of the corresponding RDF type, i.e. depending on the incoming or outgoing classes this subset of resources acts as a set of subjects or objects.
        Parameters:
        hsSubject - IDs act as subjects - remember: subject ID could be the same as object ID !.
        hsObject - IDs act as objects.

      • getOutgoingCategories

        public abstract ArrayList<SingleJoinModel> getOutgoingCategories​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hs,
                                                                 URI center)
        Returns all reachable outgoing categories for a set of resources of a specific RDF type.

                                                                 URI center)
        Returns all reachable incoming categories for a set of resources of a specific RDF type.

      • getConnectedPredicates

        public abstract ConnectedPredicates getConnectedPredicates​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsSubject,
                                                           org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hsObject,
                                                           URI center,
                                                           URI outsider)
        Returns all predicates which exist as a connection between a subset of a RDF class and a complete RDF class. The hash set contains a subset of resources of the corresponding RDF class, i.e. depending on the incoming or outgoing classes this subset of resources acts as a set of subjects or objects.

      • getSubsetFromIterator

        public abstract org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleString getSubsetFromIterator​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<String> hs,
                                                                                  org.rdfhdt.hdt.enums.TripleComponentRole role,
                                                                                  org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleString itString)
        Filters the triple IDs of an iterator by the resources contained in the passed hash set, e.g. if the triple component role is set to subject, then it returns all triples which have a subject ID that is contained in the hash set.
        Parameters:
        hs - The hash set which contains the subject or object IDs.
        itString - Contains triple strings from which a subset of resources should be extracted.
        role - Defines whether the hash set contains subjects or objects.

      • getSubsetFromIterator

        public abstract org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleID getSubsetFromIterator​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> hs,
                                                                              org.rdfhdt.hdt.enums.TripleComponentRole role,
                                                                              org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleID itID)
        Filters the triple IDs of an iterator by the resources contained in the passed hash set, e.g. if the triple component role is set to subject, then it returns all triples which have a subject ID that is contained in the hash set.
        Parameters:
        hs - The hash set which contains the subject or object IDs.
        itID - Contains triple IDs from which a subset of resources should be extracted.
        role - Defines whether the hash set contains subjects or objects.

      • executeSubsetQueryString

        public abstract org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.IteratorTripleString executeSubsetQueryString​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<String> hs,
                                                                                     org.rdfhdt.hdt.enums.TripleComponentRole role,
                                                                                     URI typeURI1,
                                                                                     URI typeURI2,
                                                                                     String s,
                                                                                     String p,
                                                                                     String o)
        Executes a query on type1-type2 and removes afterwards the triples from the result set whose subject resource are not hash set.
        Parameters:
        hs - The hash set which contains the subject which should appear in the resulting subset.
        typeURI1 -
        typeURI2 -
        s - Subject query parameter
        p - Predicate query parameter
        o - Object query parameter
        role - Defines whether the hash set contains subject or object IDs.
        Returns:
        Returns the resulting subset as an array list.

        typeURI2 -

        o - Object query parameter
